body_html:
May I know the progress on this issue? Auto placement is a really nice shot for TF guys to benefit its distributed execution model. We have tried to do some kind of alike work by mixing data-parallelism with model-parallelism to get a trade-off between computation and communication and see promising improvement against standard data-parallelism implementation, also we are trying to automate this work. So maybe there are some potential collaboration with this issue.

@yuefengz @benoitsteiner

body:
May I know the progress on this issue? Auto placement is a really nice shot for TF guys to benefit its distributed execution model. We have tried to do some kind of alike work by mixing data-parallelism with model-parallelism to get a trade-off between computation and communication and see promising improvement against standard data-parallelism implementation, also we are trying to automate this work. So maybe there are some potential collaboration with this issue.

@yuefengz @benoitsteiner
